attributes.action: Stop eroding our long held freedoms and rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Banned. The right to hold gatherings, hunting, smoking. Thousands of miles of ancient roads closed. Silly speed limits outside towns. Arrest on suspicion. Id cards proposed. Surveillance. Police shoot innocent people. M/cycling restrictions. M/cycle licenses removed @ 70. Police machine gunners @ airports. Freedom of speech restricted. Stealth taxes increased. Police harrassment. Government manipulates figures. Religious beliefs persecuted. E-petitions are censored. Illegal war in iraq. Police stop & search at will. Communities ghettoised. Hospitals closed. Govt abuse of the people. Helicopter & satellite surveillance. Spy in the sky driver control proposed. Democratic process manipulated. Eu tax paid goods not allowed into uk. Downing street protests banned. Surveillance cameras everywhere. Government indoctrination adverts on tv. Building regulations too restrictive. Persecution of sunday bikers meetings. Freedom of choice eroded.
Big brother’s proud of all this
Sign here & protest
